articles.title: Greetings to Russian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Russian President
Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, Monday sent a message of greeting to Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin, president of the Russian Federation.
					 The full text of the message is:
					
					 Please accept my warm congratulations to you and your people on the national day of the Russian Federation.
					
					 I believe that the relations between the two countries with a long history and tradition of friendship will strengthen in line with the joint documents both sides agreed and the wishes of the two peoples.
					
					 I wish you successes in your responsible work for building powerful Russia and protecting its security and interests and your people welfare and prosperity.

articles.title: King of Netherlands Hopes for Strengthened Ties with DPRK
articles.content:
King of Netherlands Hopes for Strengthened Ties with DPRK
Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- The DPRK ambassador to the Netherlands presented his credentials to the king of this country on June 7.
					 The king hoped that the Korean people would continue to register successes in the economic construction and the work for improvement of the people's living and that the bilateral ties would further develop in the interests of the two peoples.

articles.title: Russian Embassy Officials Lay Wreath before Liberation Tower
articles.content:
Russian Embassy Officials Lay Wreath before Liberation Tower
Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- Staff members of the Russian embassy here laid a wreath before the Liberation Tower on Monday to mark the national day of Russia.
					 Among those present at the wreath-laying ceremony was Ambassador Alexandr Matsegora.
					
					 The participants paid silent tribute to the fallen fighters of the Soviet Army after placing a wreath in the name of the embassy. Then they looked round the tower.
					
					 They also laid a wreath and bouquets and flowers at the cemetery of fallen fighters of the Soviet Army in Sadong District, Pyongyang.
					
					 Meanwhile, members of the Russian consulate general in Chongjin City placed wreaths at the Liberation Tower and the cemetery of fallen fighters of the Soviet Army in the city on the same day.

articles.title: Youth and Students Tour Revolutionary Battle Sites in Mt Paektu Area
articles.content:
Youth and Students Tour Revolutionary Battle Sites in Mt Paektu Area
Hyesan, June 12 (KCNA) -- Youth and students from across the country made a study tour of revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt Paektu from June 3 to 12 on the occasion of the 80th anniversary of the victorious Pochonbo battle commanded by President Kim Il Sung.
					 They started the study tour from Hyesan. Arriving at historic Pochonbo they went round different places of the battle site.
					
					 They attended the candlelight procession and campfire meeting.
					
					 They arrived at Samjiyon via the Spring Site in Poso-ri, the Tableland of Junghung from where Mt Paektu was in sight.
					
					 Arriving in Samjiyon County, they placed a floral basket and bunches of flowers at the statue of leader Kim Jong Il in the county and paid tribute to him. 
					
					 Then they went round the Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station.
					
					 Atop Mt Paektu the visitors held an oath-taking meeting.
					
					 Visiting leader Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the Paektusan Secret Camp they looked round the historic relics preserved there, recalling his revolutionary life. 
					
					 They went round the headquarters log cabin, the guerrillas quarters, the well used by anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk and trees bearing revolutionary slogans written by her.
					
					 At the Rimyongsu Revolutionary Site, they learnt in detail about the feats of Kim Jong Il who saw to it that the revolutionary traditions of Mt Paektu would shine as eternal foundation of the Party and the revolution by exploring the way for the study tour of revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt Paektu. 
					
					 They also looked round the site of headquarters and slogan-bearing trees at Chongbong and Konchang bivouacs.
					
					 During their tour, they conducted diverse political and cultural activities such as a contest of singing revolutionary songs in chorus, meeting for hearing impressions of the reminiscences of anti-Japanese guerrillas and question-and-answer study contest.

articles.title: National Symposium on Conservation of Migratory Birds
articles.content:
National Symposium on Conservation of Migratory Birds
Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- A national workshop on the conservation and management of the intertidal wetlands and migratory waterbirds in the West Sea of Korea took place at the Grand People's Study House on Monday.
					 Present there were officials of ministries, national institutions, scientific research institutions and related units such as the Ministry of Land and Environment Protection and the Central Committee of the Nature Conservation Union of Korea and members of the International Union for Conservation of Nature, the Partnership for the East Asian-Australasian Flyway and the Hanns Seidel Foundation of Germany.
					
					 The workshop stressed the need to boost the international cooperation in conserving the migratory birds directly linking with the existence and development of human beings. Its participants were briefed on the intertidal wetlands of the West Sea of Korea, region favorable to the habitation of the migratory birds.

articles.title: New Kinds of Leather Shoes Made in DPRK
articles.content:
New Kinds of Leather Shoes Made in DPRK
Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- The Management Bureau for the Shoe-making Industry under the Ministry of Light Industry in the DPRK has recently produced scores of kinds of leather shoes.
					 Those shoes are enjoying popularity among customers for being national in style, modern in beauty and diverse in shape and color.
					
					 Leather shoes for women and children, in particular, are in high demand as they go well with national costumes.

articles.title: Meritorious Medical Workers Adding Glory to Mallima Era
articles.content:
Meritorious Medical Workers Adding Glory to Mallima Era
Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- There had been witnessed a number of stories associated with human love in the Chollima era, during which the historic cause of the socialist industrialization was accomplished in the DPRK.
					 Such stories associated with human love are given steady continuity even in the present Mallima era.
					
					 Among them is the one about Han Hye Gyong, a doctor at the Hamhung Railway Hospital who was awarded the title of Merited Doctor last year when the whole country was immersed in the 70-day campaign and 200-day campaign.
					
					 She has made a research into caput femoris aseptic necrosis for over 20 years to gain such achievements as healing thousands of patients.
					
					 Merited Doctor Choe Sun Ok, director of the Ryongsan-ri People's Hospital in Junghwa County, has made a contribution to putting an end to infantile mortality for a long period, considerably decreasing the mortality from diseases and curing hundreds of hard cases with Koryo therapy.
					
					 And medical workers at the cardiovascular surgery of the Okryu Children's Hospital, the Koryo therapy department of the North Phyongan Provincial People's Hospital and the Pyongyang Municipal Emergency Hospital are devoting their all to the preventive and curative medical care for the promotion of people's health.

articles.title: June 15 Joint Declaration Should Be Implemented to Repair North-South Relations
articles.content:
June 15 Joint Declaration Should Be Implemented to Repair North-South Relations
Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- It is 17 years since the publication of the historic June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 On the occasion of the unforgettable day when the joint declaration was published, all Koreans are nostalgic about the precious era when the history of protracted distrust and confrontation turned into the one of reconciliation and unity, peace and reunification.
					
					 The declaration is the foundation of national reconciliation and unity and the starting point of solving the issue of the north-south relations. Its validity and vitality as the great programme for reunification common to all Koreans were already proved in practice.
					
					 The era of independent reunification when all Koreans pooled their efforts to settle the issue of reunification by themselves was ushered in by the declaration. This led to the adoption of the October 4 declaration, a practical programme for accelerating the fresh development of the north-south relations and promoting the prosperity common to all Koreans.
					
					 Had the June 15 era been given steady continuity, a big stride would have been already made in the accomplishment of the cause of national reunification without turns and twists.
					
					 But the south Korean conservative group taking pleasure in sycophancy toward big powers, dependence on outsiders and confrontation with the compatriots utterly denied the joint declaration signed by the north and the south and brought the north-south ties to collapse for the last decade in power. This is, indeed, a high treason against the nation.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group, terming the June 15 era of reunification a "lost decade" and asserting "unification should never be achieved by June 15 style," unhesitatingly undermined the foundation for improving the north-south relations though it was made with much effort in the spirit of By the Korean Nation Itself.
					
					 The regime revived the "theory of principal enemy" under the motto of "denuclearization, opening, 3 000 dollars." It disallowed regular events for reunification of various circles and reduced the inter-Korean relationship to that of distrust and confrontation. 
					
					 The Park Geun Hye regime brought the north-south relations to total collapse, raising such theories of confrontation between social systems as "trust-building process on the Korean peninsula", "Dresden declaration" and "great opportunity for unification."
					
					 Due to a handful of traitors who betrayed the nation to seek sycophancy to the U.S., the hard-won gains common to all Koreans were destroyed and the dark clouds of a nuclear war were brought to exterminate the Korean nation.
					
					 As history shows, everything goes well for the nation and reunification, peace and prosperity can be achieved if the June 15 declaration is preserved and implemented, but if not, the nation should sustain misfortune, pain and war disaster.
					
					 The present regime of south Korea is following the U.S. moves to stifle the DPRK while talking about the improvement of the north-south relations. It is doing such a stupid act, oblivious of the lesson taught by history.
					
					 Its succession to the anachronistic confrontation policy against the nation will only make it face stern punishment by the public like the conservative group.
					
					 To implement the June 15 joint declaration is just the way for mending the north-south relations and achieving peace and prosperity.
					
					 All Koreans in the north, the south and abroad will have to bring about a U-turn in the north-south relations by respecting and thoroughly implementing the great programmes for reunification common to the nation before doing anything else.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Urges Earlier Repatriation of DPRK Women from S. Korea
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Urges Earlier Repatriation of DPRK Women from S. Korea
Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) --An active struggle is under way for the repatriation of Kim Ryon Hui and twelve other women, citizens of the DPRK, who are under detention in south Korea.
					 People of all social standings, media and experts in south Korea assert that a probe into the truth behind the abduction of women citizens of the DPRK and solution to it are a measure of top priority importance for the improvement of "human rights" to be taken by the present "government", and an urgent issue.
					
					 Their abduction is a crime against humanity which can never be tolerated, an issue produced by the Park Geun Hye group of traitors' hideous moves for confrontation with the fellow countrymen.
					
					 In April 2016, the south Korean puppet forces abducted in group 12 DPRK citizens in Ningbo, Zhejiang Province of China and took them to south Korea in a bid to use them for meeting their sinister political and strategic purposes.
					
					 Finding it hard to calm down the voices of DPRK women and the public at home and abroad for their repatriation, the Park group let the Unification Ministry announce that "those women were made to settle in society after going through investigation by relevant authorities".
					
					 The puppet forces categorically stood against the repatriation of Kim Ryon Hui who was taken to south Korea after being abducted by flesh traffickers in September 2011.
					
					 Kim, after finding herself to having been cheated into south Korea, anxiously asked for her repatriation back to the DPRK, lamenting her abduction to south Korea and staging a hunger struggle.
					
					 However, the puppet forces insisted that she came to south Korea at her will and cited such absurd pretext that she is a criminal who was caught red-handed while conducting "spying" activities, maintaining that her repatriation is impossible.
					
					 Despite the DPRK's repeated requests for the repatriation of Kim Ryon Hui, the puppet forces went vicious to use her for meeting their sinister purposes, while linking her issue with the repatriation of those who were detected and arrested in the north while conducting anti-DPRK spying operations.
					
					 The "National Assembly" and the ruling and opposition parties are talking about "reunions of separated families and relatives" of the north and the south at a time when the south Korean authorities are deliberately evading the repatriation of abducted DPRK women, a product of the Park Geun Hye group's confrontation policy.
					
					 The abduction and detention of DPRK women are hideous crimes against humanity that separated parents and children and deliberately produced more "separated families".
					
					 It is highly illogical to talk about "reunions of separated families and relatives" without solving the repatriation of DPRK women as the puppet forces added the pain of forced separation to the tragic national division, being seized by confrontation with the fellow countrymen, in disregard of human ethics and international law.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities are truly interested in the issue of "separated families", they should settle the issue of repatriation of the women whom they put under detention in south Korea for absurd reason.
					
					 No humanitarian work including the reunions of families divided into the north and the south can be realized before the settlement of this issue.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blames Japanese Reactionaries for Drawing Water to Their Mill by Accusing Others
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blames Japanese Reactionaries for Drawing Water to Their Mill by Accusing Others
Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- At G-7 summit held shortly ago, the Japanese chief executive talked nonsense that the DPRK's nuclear and missile development is a "serious threat" to world peace and stability and it is necessary to disarm it of its nuclear weapons with "high-handed counteraction" directing the efforts to pressure rather than to dialogue.
					And the chief Cabinet secretary, the foreign minister and other high-ranking officials and riff-raffs of Japan have asserted that financial channel should be checked to deter the DPRK's nuclear and missile development and it is important for the international community to strictly implement the UNSC's "sanctions resolutions" against the DPRK through close cooperation.
					
					 Commenting on the facts, Rodong Sinmun Monday says this is a clumsy deed that can be done only by the reactionaries of Japan whose disgusting bad habit is to accuse others and then seek its own profits.
					
					 There is no need for any country which is friendly toward the DPRK and does not follow the U.S. anti-DPRK policy to worry about the DPRK's test-fire of ballistic rocket, it says, and goes on:
					
					 The DPRK solemnly declared that it keeps tabs on new crimes committed by Japan and that if Japan persists in hostility toward it, not properly seeing the reality, its target of powerful ballistic rockets may be changed.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries would be well advised to stop such foolish act as precipitating its self-destruction and behave itself, clearly aware of this.
					
					 It will be beneficial to Japan's future.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Urged to See Mindset of Candlelight Demonstrators
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Urged to See Mindset of Candlelight Demonstrators
Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- Government and parliamentary delegations of the U.S. flew into south Korea to press its new ruling quarters over diplomatic and security policies and stand on the deployment of THAAD, etc. Even they urged the south Korean authorities not to repeat "sunshine policy" and "engagement policy" but closely cooperate between both sides. On June 5, the missile defense director of the U.S. Defense Department and the commander of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces in south Korea visited Chongwadae to stress the reason for the THAAD deployment.
					 Meanwhile, policy study organs and media of the U.S. spread the public opinion that the Trump administration is very displeased with the present south Korean authorities and that serious discord would arise, so as to mentally press south Korea.
					
					 Commenting on the facts, Rodong Sinmun Monday says: Such moves of the U.S. are a revelation of uneasiness about the fact that obstacles would be laid in the way for implementation of its DPRK policy and strategy for Asia-Pacific domination after the emergence of the new "government" in south Korea as well as of its inveterate repugnancy toward the democratic reformist forces in south Korea.
					
					 Citing facts to prove that whenever the democratic reformist forces took power in south Korea, the U.S. made desperate efforts to interfere in the internal affairs of south Korea so as to put them under its control, the daily goes on:
					
					 Now the U.S. is advertising that the major agenda of the U.S.-south Korea summit to be held late in June would be the issue on strengthening the "alliance".
					
					 The south Korean authorities, fearful of the U.S. arbitrary practice, actively avail themselves of the U.S. anti-DPRK sanctions campaign, talking about contradictory words "carrying out sanctions and dialogue side by side". They expressed the concessive will "not to change the existing decision" over the issue of THAAD deployment.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should come to their senses, though belatedly.
					
					 The democratic reformist forces' coming to power in south Korea was an option of the south Korean people who launched candlelight actions to put an end to the crime-woven pro-U.S. conservative regime. 
					
					 The present south Korean authorities have no right to turn aside the mindset of the candlelight demonstrators.

articles.title: Dynamic Struggle for Ending GIs' Presence in S. Korea Urged
articles.content:
Dynamic Struggle for Ending GIs' Presence in S. Korea Urged
Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the North-side Headquarters of the Nationwide Special Committee for Probing the Truth behind the GIs' Crimes released a statement on Monday over the lapse of 15 years since U.S. imperialists brutally killed two girl students of south Korea.
					 The statement said:
					
					 An armored vehicle of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces in south Korea ran over and mercilessly killed the two girls Sin Hyo Sun and Sim Mi Son on a road of Kwangjok-myon of Yangju City in Kyonggi Province in broad daylight on June 13, 2002.
					
					 This murder case was neither an accidental incident nor a crime of individual GI but an inevitable product of the U.S. imperialists' military presence in south Korea.
					
					 The seven decades-long history of the U.S. military presence in south Korea is characterized by the most hideous aggression, plunder and murder GIs perpetrated to trample down the south Korea's aspiration and desire for independence and impose unbearable destiny of colonial slaves upon them.
					
					 Not content with bringing unheard-of disgrace, humiliation, disaster and pain upon the south Korean people, the gangster-like U.S. imperialist aggressors are running amuck to impose a terrible nuclear holocaust upon the Korean nation while frantically staging a risky war racket against the DPRK.
					
					 All facts go to clearly prove that the U.S. is neither a "nation friendly" to the south Korean people nor their "guardian" but a root cause of all misfortune and pain of the Korean nation.
					
					 The south Korean people should stage a high-pitched struggle for independence against the U.S. in order to drive the U.S. imperialist aggressors, the sworn enemy of the Korean nation, out of south Korea and regain their dignity and sovereignty.
					
					 To put an end to the U.S. domination and control, they should resolutely foil the treacherous moves of the pro-U.S. forces seeking to maintain power with the backing of the U.S.
					
					 All Koreans in the north, the south and abroad will surely bring earlier the day of independent reunification when they will be free from outsiders' interference by staging a brisk nationwide struggle to put an end to the U.S. imperialist aggression forces' presence in south Korea, the root cause of all misfortune and trouble.

articles.title: Luxembourgian Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to Great Persons of Mt Paektu Formed
articles.content:
Luxembourgian Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to Great Persons of Mt Paektu Formed
Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- A Luxembourgian preparatory committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu was formed.
					 Robert Medernach was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.

articles.title: Swiss Bodies Support DPRK Steps for Bolstering Military Capability
articles.content:
Swiss Bodies Support DPRK Steps for Bolstering Military Capability
Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- The Swiss Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on June 5 in support of the just stand of the DPRK to bolster up its munitions industry for self-defense.
					 Noting that the UNSC cooked up again "sanctions resolution" against the DPRK, over its ballistic rocket test-fire for bolstering the nuclear force, only to be categorically rejected by the DPRK, the statement said:
					
					 It would be a big mistake if those countries involved in the adoption of "resolution" think that it can delay or prevent the DPRK's rapid development of nuclear force even a bit.
					
					 It is nonsensical to talk about dialogue while setting forth unreasonable conditions and putting "maximum pressure".
					
					 The DPRK will fire "Juche weapons" one after another until the U.S. and its vassal forces properly understand the root cause of the nuclear issue on the Korean peninsula and the way for its settlement and make a proper choice.
					
					 We are opposed to the "resolutions" against the DPRK.
					
					 The UNSC is a puppet body of the U.S.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un felicita el Dia Nacional de Federacion Rusa
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un felicita el Dia Nacional de Federacion Rusa
Pyongyang, 12 de junio (ACNC) -- El Presidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Jong Un, envio el dia 12 un mensaje de felicitacion al Presidente de la Federacion Rusa, Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin.
					El texto senala:
					
					En ocasion del Dia Nacional de la Federacion Rusa, extiendo a Vd. y a su pueblo mis calidas felicitaciones. 
					
					Estoy convencido de que las relaciones entre los dos paises, que tienen larga historia y tradicion de amistad, se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran en virtud de los documentos conjuntos de ambas partes y conforme a la aspiracion de los dos pueblos. 
					
					Deseo a Vd. los exitos en sus responsabilidades por construir una Rusia poderosa y defender la seguridad y los intereses del pais y a su pueblo, el bienestar y la prosperidad.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam expresa condolencias al presidente de Myanmar
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam expresa condolencias al presidente de Myanmar
Pyongyang, 12 de junio (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, remitio el dia 10 un mensaje de condolencias al presidente de la Republica de la Union de Myanmar, Htin Kyaw, en relacion con que hubo muchas perdidas humanas por la caida de un avion militar en ese pais.
					En su misiva, el remitente expreso al destinatario profunda compasion y consuelo que hizo extensivos a las victimas y sus familiares.

articles.title: Rey holandes desea desarrollo de relaciones con la RPDC
articles.content:
Rey holandes desea desarrollo de relaciones con la RPDC
Pyongyang, 12 de junio (ACNC) -- El nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea entrego el dia 7 sus cartas credenciales al rey de Holanda.
					El monarca europeo deseo que el pueblo coreano siga logrando exitos en la construccion economica y en las tareas para el mejoramiento de la calidad de su vida y se desarrollen mas las relaciones bilaterales conforme a los intereses de ambos pueblos.

articles.title: Portavoz de Jonminthukwi llama a dinamizar lucha contra la ocupacion militar de EE.UU
articles.content:
Portavoz de Jonminthukwi llama a dinamizar lucha contra la ocupacion militar de EE.UU
Pyongyang, 12 de junio (ACNC) -- El vocero de la Direccion Nortena de Jonminthukwi (Comite Pannacional de Averiguacion Especial para Esclarecer Verdaderos Aspectos de Crimenes de Tropas Norteamericanas) hizo publica el dia 12 una nota con respecto a que se cumplen 15 anos desde cuando los uniformados norteamericanos ocupantes del Sur de Corea asesinaron a dos alumnas surcoreanas de la secundaria.
					El 13 de junio de 2002, los carros blindados de las fuerzas norteamericanas atropellaron a plena luz del dia en una autopista del canton de Kwangjok de la ciudad de Yangju de la provincia de Kyonggi a Sin Hyo Sun y Sim Mi Son quienes pasaban por ahi, recuerda el documento y prosigue:
					
					Este asesinato no es un incidente accidental ni crimen de algunos uniformados yanquis sino el producto inevitable de la ocupacion del Sur de Corea por los imperialistas estadounidenses.
					
					Mas de 70 anos de la presencia militar norteamericana son la historia de agresion, saqueo, homicidio y crimen en que los ocupantes frustraron la aspiracion independiente de la poblacion surcoreana imponiendole el destino de esclava colonial.
					
					Insatisfechos de haber impuesto a los habitantes surcoreanos la afrenta, humillacion, calamidades y sufrimientos sin precedentes de la historia, los agresores yanquis estan desesperados ahora para hacer sufrir a toda la nacion coreana los desastres de guerra nuclear frecuentando los peligrosos entrenamientos de agresion al Norte de Corea.
					
					Los hechos testimonian que el imperio americano no es "aliado" ni "protector" de la poblacion surcoreana sino la causa de todas las desgracias y sufrimientos de la nacion coreana.
					
					Los habitantes surcoreanos deben intensificar la lucha antiyanqui y por la independencia destinada a expulsar del suelo surcoreano al imperialismo norteamericano, enemigo jurado de la nacion coreana, y recuperar la verdadera dignidad y soberania.
					
					Para dar punto final a la dominacion y subyugacion de EE.UU., es imperioso frustrar rotundamente las maniobras antinacionales de los lacayos proyanquis que quieren mantener el derecho adquirido con la ayuda de su patron.
					
					Todos los coreanos en el Norte, el Sur y ultramar libraran con vigor la lucha pannacional por acabar con la presencia militar norteamericana en el Sur de Corea y adelantaran sin falta el dia de reunificacion independiente sin la injerencia extranjera.

articles.title: Jovenes y estudiantes visitan los lugares de batalla revolucionaria de monte Paektu
articles.content:
Jovenes y estudiantes visitan los lugares de batalla revolucionaria de monte Paektu
Hyesan, 12 de junio (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 80o aniversario de la Victoria en la Batalla de Pochonbo, organizada y dirigida por el Presidente Kim Il Sung, los jovenes y estudiantes de todo el pais realizaron del dia 3 al 12 el recorrido por los lugares de batalla revolucionaria de la zona del monte Paektu.
					Ellos partieron de Hyesan hacia Pochonbo donde recorrieron varios lugares.
					
					Participaron en la marcha con antorcha y el encuentro al lado de la fogata.
					
					Pasando por el manantial de Posori, subieron a la meseta de Junghung, de donde se ve el monte Paektu.
					
					En el distrito de Samji rindieron homenaje al Dirigente Kim Jong Il tras depositar cesto y ramos de flores ante su estatua de bronce.
					
					Visitaron la Central Hidroelectrica Heroes Jovenes Paektusan.
					
					En la cimera del monte Paektu organizaron el acto de juramento.
					
					Estuvieron en la casa natal del Dirigente Kim Jong Il en el campamento secreto del monte Paektu, donde recordaron la vida revolucionaria del Dirigente y vieron los objetos historicos conservados alli.
					
					Recorrieron la isba de la Comandancia y el cuartel y el pozo usado por la Heroina de la Lucha Antijaponesa Kim Jong Suk y los arboles con las consignas revolucionarias, escritas por ella misma.
					
					En el Lugar de interes historico-revolucionario de Rimyongsu, los visitantes recordaron las hazanas del Dirigente quien al explorar el camino de recorrido por los lugares de batalla revolucionaria de la zona del monte Paektu, hizo glorificar la tradicion revolucionaria del Paektu como el eterno cimiento del partido y la revolucion.
					
					En los campamentos de Chongbong y Konchang, ellos vieron el lugar de comandancia, los arboles con consignas y otros puntos.
					
					Durante el recorrido, ellos organizaron el concurso del coro de las canciones revolucionarias, el encuentro de presentacion de reminiscencias de los guerrilleros antijaponeses, el concurso de pregunta y respuesta y otras labores politicas y culturales.

articles.title: ACNC exige en comentario la devolucion de norcoreanas retenidas en el Sur de Corea
articles.content:
ACNC exige en comentario la devolucion de norcoreanas retenidas en el Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 12 de junio (ACNC) -- En estos tiempos, se alzan en el Sur de Corea las voces en demanda de la devolucion de Kim Ryon Hui y 12 ciudadanas de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, retenidas injustamente en suelo surcoreano. 
					Las entidades de diferentes circulos, los medios de prensa y los especialistas dicen que la solucion y la averiguacion de la verdad del caso de secuestro de las ciudadanas norcoreanas son un problema urgente y la primera medida que debe tomar el "gobierno" actual para el mejoramiento de la situacion de derechos humanos. 
					
					El presente caso de rapto es el intolerable crimen de lesa humanidad cometido por la banda traidora de Park Geun-hye, condenada por el pueblo surcoreano, en virtud de su infame politica de enfrentamiento fratricida. 
					
					En abril de 2016, los titeres surcoreanos secuestraron a plena luz del dia a las 12 muchachas de la RPDC en Ningbo de la provincia china de Zhejiang y las llevaron al Sur de Corea con el malsano objetivo politico. 
					
					Impotentes de silenciar la demanda de repatriacion de las secuestradas y la opinion publica interna y externa, publicaron por conducto del Ministerio de Unificacion que "ellas se asentaron una tras otra en la sociedad surcoreana luego de someterse a la investigacion de autoridades competentes". 
					
					La banda de Park Geun-hye impidio tambien el regreso a la patria de Kim Ryon Hui quien en septiembre de 2011, fue seducida y llevada al Sur de Corea por los traficantes de personas. 
					
					Kim solicito reiteradamente a las autoridades surcoreanas que la devolvieran a su tierra natal.
					
					Sin embargo, los titeres surcoreanos rechazaron la peticion insistiendo en que ella vino al Sur de Corea segun su "voluntad libre" y "cometio actividades de espionaje". 
					
					Ante la reiterada exigencia de la RPDC sobre la repatriacion de Kim Ryon Hui, ellos trataron de emplear este caso en sus siniestros objetivos vinculandolo con el tema de devolucion de los delincuentes que fueron arrestados por sus actos de espionaje y complots anti-RPDC. 
					
					Cuando las actuales autoridades surcoreanas eluden el problema de devolucion, la "Asamblea Nacional" y los partidos en el poder y de la oposicion del Sur de Corea insisten en el "encuentro de los familiares separados" en ambas partes coreanas. 
					
					El secuestro y la retencion forzada de las ciudadanas de la RPDC resulta un crimen antietico que fabrica artificialmente los "familiares separados" apartando a las hijas de sus padres. 
					
					Pues, es absurdo discutir el "encuentro de familiares separados" sin la devolucion de las ciudadanas de la RPDC. 
					
					Si las autoridades surcoreanas estan interesadas de veras en el problema de "familiares separados", deberan devolver lo mas pronto posible a las norcoreanas retenidas injustamente. 
					
					Antes de que se resuelva este problema, no se realizara ninguna cooperacion humanitaria Norte-Sur, incluso el encuentro referido.
